a.h1: Iola-Scandinavia School District Dedicated to Excellence

li.a: Field Trip and Transportation Request Form

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.style: text-align: center; border: solid 1px #FFFFFF; padding: 8px 10px; border-radius: 12px; display: inline-block; background: #000000; margin-left: 5px;

div.p: Iola-Scandinavia families and staff: Please check your emails and the "News" section at the bottom right of the district website iola.k12.wi.us for the latest information regarding COVID-19 precautions, cancellations, and updates.

Please visit the district's COVID-19 web page for information on meal delivery changes taking place next week and for information on curriculum material delivery starting Thursday morning (previous message incorrectly said Wed) https://www.iola.k12.wi.us/o/issd/page/covid-19--61
Please visit the COVID-19 page of the district website for I-S Instructional Guidelines (apparently there was in issue with the previously sent link)

Breakfast and lunch will now be offered during spring break week (March 23-27). If you're interested in participating please update your response or complete the google form linked here (https://forms.gle/H6tddmmiGGuHnyye7)
TODAY is the last day to stop in the elementary school to check out books to read during the closure. The library will be open until 3:30pm. We hope to see as many students as possible.
Please click below for Iola-Scandinavia District Updates COVID-19 Updates
March 12, 2020 RE: WIAA Boys Basketball Sectional Final Game vs Lourdes Academy @ Kimberly High School 7:00pm Following the directive from the WIAA that was released this morning there have...
